title_job: VR Engineer experienced with Meta Quest infrastructure and AWS
description:
Looking for a VR Engineer with extensive experience with Quest infrastructure and API. Experience with other platforms is a plus.
Experience creating custom packages in Unity is required.
AWS experience including resource configuration and basic administration tasks is required.

Software knowledge required:
-ะก# development
-System development
-Quest API
-Video capture and streaming APIs
-Android VR development
-Unity3D for VR development

Expert-level proficiency and rich hands-on experience with VR. Skills and experience in algorithm analysis, OOD, functional design. Knowledge of Quest API, video APIs, encoding. Understanding of different VR systems, capabilities, and limitations when working on unified software for different systems. Develop software for a variety of VR devices.

Preferred:
-Unity plugin development
-unity SDK
-Streaming protocols

Please send your rates and availability.
INDEPENDENT contractors only, NO AGENCIES

Signing an NDA is required.

Availability to have meetings in GMT-7 and GMT-5 time zones is required.

Thank you

We will review the applications and start responding the week of September 9th
